title: Romance & Heartbreak
description: Who is the hopeless romantic? Who is the heartbreaker? A deck for singles, couples, and gossip lovers regarding dating habits.

cards.content: Most likely to text their ex after one drink?
Most likely to fall in love with the bartender?
